data.name: Stalks Stalks Stalks - Support the Devs DLC
data.detailed_description: This DLC is meant to financially support the devs. Nothing is added to the game except a message thanking you for your support.
data.about_the_game: This DLC is meant to financially support the devs. Nothing is added to the game except a message thanking you for your support.
data.short_description: This DLC is meant to financially support the devs. Nothing is added to the game except a message thanking you for your support.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 8
  • Processor: 1.5GHz +
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB VRAM Intel HD 4000 / GeForce 200 Series / Radeon HD 4000 Series
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.0GHz +
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB VRAM Intel HD 4000 / GeForce 200 Series / Radeon HD 4000 Series
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
